channel.title: Lady Tiandra on tlake.io
channel.description: Recent content in Lady Tiandra on tlake.io

item.title: Vision Quest
item.description: After the shared experience of Lady Mayweather, the parties visions diverge to mostly unsettling ends. Gimble and Nyx need assistance recovering, and the party seeks guidance from Lady Tiandra.

item.title: Spring Break
item.description: Horns has an overnight adventure with the local druids, Gimble succeeds in getting a glimpse of Finn’s lost family, and an audience with Lady Tiandra leads the party to a vision quest.
